most_active_tickets.title: Unable to open Pieces Core Services
Unable to open Pieces Core Services

common_issues.title: Pieces Core Services Fails to Open Due to WebSocket Error
common_issues.description: Multiple users reported a WebSocketException with a 404 HTTP status code when attempting to open Pieces Core Services. The connection to 'http://127.0.0.1:39300/user/last_checked_in/stream#' fails to upgrade to a websocket.  While installation succeeded, the PiecesOS version remains unknown.  Users are on Windows 10 with varying builds and hardware configurations. Further investigation into the server-side and potential port conflicts is needed.

related_issues.title: Unable to open Pieces Core Services
related_issues.text:

recommendations: Investigate the root cause of the WebSocketException error when opening Pieces Core Services.
Check for potential port conflicts on port 39300.
Verify server-side functionality and ensure proper WebSocket upgrade handling.
Gather more detailed logs and diagnostics from affected users.
Provide troubleshooting steps to users experiencing the WebSocketException error.
Consider implementing a fallback mechanism if WebSocket connection fails.
Update documentation with known issues and workarounds.
